REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub KontaktDaten() Dim oTables as Object Dim oRecord_Kontakt as Object,oRecord1 as Object,sBody as String,sVorname as String Dim sDocument_Name as String,sNummern as String,sKontakte as String,sAnrede as String Dim sName as String,sName1 as String,sName2 as String,sName3 as String,sName4 as String Dim sTelefon as String,sFunktelefon as String,sFax as String,sEMail as String,sTitel as String Dim oStyleFamilies as Object,oPageStyles as Object,oPageStyle_1 as Object,oPageStyle_2 as Object Dim oBookmark As Object,oBookmarkAnchor as Object,oRangeCursor as Object Dim oSelections as Object,oSize as Object,vGraphics as Variant,iPrint_Logo as Integer Dim oTable_Verteiler as Object,iCount as integer Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String,iCountSerienbrief as Integer Dim oCursor as Object,oCursorKopf1 as Object,oCursorKopf2 as Object,oBookmarks as Object,oAnschors as Object Dim vStatus as Variant,vTables as Variant,vTableVerteiler as Variant,vRowsVerteiler as Variant Dim vViewCursor as Variant Dim document as Object Dim dispatcher as Object
GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") vTables = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTables") vTables = oDoc.getTextTables vTableVerteiler = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") vTableVerteiler = vTables.getByName("Verteiler") vRowsVerteiler = vTableVerteiler.getRows() vViewCursor = oDoc.CurrentController.getViewCursor()
iCountSerienbrief=1
sSQL1="select KontaktTyp from "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() sKontakte=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend
sSQL2="select distinct "&_ "t1.Document_Name,t1.DocumentID,t1.Anrede,t1.Body,t2.Name1,t2.Name2,"&_ "t2.Name3,t2.Name4,t2.Vorname,t2.Titel,t2.Anrede,t2.EMail,t2.Telefon,t2.Funktelefon,t2.Fax,t1.Erstellungsdatum,t3.NameKurz"&_ " from "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) &" as t1,"& sKontakte &" as t2,Einstellungen as t3"&_ " where t2.KontaktID = t1.KontaktID"&_ " AND t3.EinstellungsID = t1.EinstellungsID"
oRecord_Kontakt=oResult_Scroll(sSQL2) oRecord_Kontakt.absolute(iCountSerienbrief) sDocument_Name=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(1) sNummern=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(17) & " " &_ "Dokumentnummer: "& UCase(Left(sKontakte,2))&_ oRecord_Kontakt.getString(2) & " " &_ "Erstellungsdatum: "& fConvDatum(oRecord_Kontakt.getString(16)) sAnrede=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(3) & Chr$(13) & Chr$(13) sBody=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(4) & Chr$(13) & Chr$(13)
Dim oFrame as Object oFrame = StarDesktop.getCurrentFrame() oFrame.setTitle(sTitle_lokal &" - Serienbriefverteiler: "& sDocument_Name)
Feld_fuellen("Document_Name",sDocument_Name) Feld_fuellen("Nummern",sNummern)
vStatus = MsgBox("Soll der Text-Inhalt des Serienbriefes mit auf dem Verteiler gedruckt werden?",36,sTitle_lokal) if vStatus = 6 then Feld_fuellen("Anrede",sAnrede) Feld_fuellen("Body",sBody) else Feld_loeschen("Anrede") Feld_loeschen("Body") end if
vViewCursor.jumpToFirstPage() vViewCursor.jumpToEndOfPage() vViewCursor.goUp(1, False)
If NOT IsEmpty(vViewCursor.Cell) Then For iCount=1 to fAnzahlSerienbriefe-1 document = ThisComponent.CurrentController.Frame dispatcher = createUnoService("com.sun.star.frame.DispatchHelper") dispatcher.executeDispatch(document, ".uno:InsertRows", "", 0, Array()) Next End If
Do While fAnzahlSerienbriefe >= iCountSerienbrief oRecord_Kontakt=oResult_Scroll(sSQL2) oRecord_Kontakt.absolute(iCountSerienbrief)
sName1=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(5) sName2=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(6) sName3=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(7) sName4=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(8) sVorname=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(9) sTitel=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(10) sAnrede=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(11) sEMail=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(12) sTelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(13) sFunktelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(14) sFax=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(15)
sName="" if sAnrede <> "" then sName = sName + sAnrede + " " End if if sTitel <> "" then sName = sName + sTitel + " " End if if sVorname <> "" then sName = sName + fsConvertString(sVorname) + " " End if if sName1 <> "" then sName = sName + fsConvertString(sName1) End if if sName2 <> "" then sName = sName & Chr(10) & fsConvertString(sName2) End if if sName3 <> "" then sName = sName & Chr(10) & fsConvertString(sName3) End if if sName4 <> "" then sName = sName & Chr(10) & fsConvertString(sName4) End if
iCountSerienbrief=iCountSerienbrief+1
vTableVerteiler.getCellByName("A" & iCountSerienbrief ).String=iCountSerienbrief-1 vTableVerteiler.getCellByName("B" & iCountSerienbrief & ".1.1").String=sName vTableVerteiler.getCellByName("B" & iCountSerienbrief & ".2.1").String=sEMail vTableVerteiler.getCellByName("B" & iCountSerienbrief & ".1.2").String=sTelefon vTableVerteiler.getCellByName("B" & iCountSerienbrief & ".2.2").String=sFunktelefon vTableVerteiler.getCellByName("B" & iCountSerienbrief & ".3.2").String=sFax
oDoc.getTextFields().refresh() Loop Dim Dummy() oDoc.print(Dummy()) End Sub
